<- Just went back to college, been dealing with financial aid bs, trying to get a job, trying to get ahead cause I have to get a 4.0 to continue having financial aid as I'm on financial aid parole, having to work on my long term project and a ton of other stuff.  Right now I only have about enough time to play two rounds of league of legends much less time for watching tv shows so you'll excuse me if I don't feel like watching through a entire tv show from beginning to end.  Oh did I mention I'm finally getting a opportunity to transition?  That takes months and months to pass.  There's also my Ran Yakumo cosplay I'm working on for halloween.

topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5372535d636872212ab90200#post_5372535d636872212ab90200
I wasn't brushing you off; rather you didn't seem to get the idea "no means no".  What I mean by fantasy I mean supernatural elements in it; ghosts, monsters and stuff like that.  I'm not saying to stop posting or stop posting mecha, a lot of people like mecha, rather stop badgering people.  It's perfectly fine to talk about things you like, but going, "NO! YOU *MUST* LIKE THE THINGS I LIKE AND HOW DARE YOU LIKE SOMETHING I HATE!" like you have been doing the past couple of months is really really annoying and you constantly bitch about things people like.

In other words I have no real problem with you other than how you constantly go, "You must like things I like and you're not allowed to not like things I don't like" and badgering people until they ignore you.  I'm not saying to stop posting mecha; rather a lot of people will like mecha shows you don't like and don't like mecha shows you like, get over it.

So what if someone likes evangelion or so forth?  Does it matter?

What are you talking about? Since when have I ever done that?

Giant robo does have supernatural elements in it though, Super powers, Chinese Magic, And shit that's just plain crazy (Also I think Yousei the Blue beast of the experts counts as a monster)[/bq]
See; that's what I'm talking about.  Even though I stated I don't like mecha you still don't get the hint and constantly try to evangelize unto the peasant masses your glorious anime mecha.

I don't like mecha; I don't hate it; I don't love it; I just don't care, but you still feel as though it's impossible for a person to not care about the things you like.

You're being friggin annoying cause 100% of your posts the last couple of months have consisted of:
"Praise glorious nippon mecha animation!  Praise be to getter!  The archangel of anime gave to me a vision of superior japanese animation, but he delivered a message unto me, 'Beware the false shepherd of western animation for he shall lead the lamb astray!'"
